carpet.rule.pcaProtocolEnabled.desc: Synchronizes Entities and BlockEntities data to the client (PCA Protocol).
carpet.rule.syncPlayer.desc: Determines which players' data can be synchronized to the client.
carpet.rule.syncPlayer.extra.0: NOBODY: No player data will be synchronized.
carpet.rule.syncPlayer.extra.1: BOT: Only data from Carpet bots can be synchronized.
carpet.rule.syncPlayer.extra.2: OPS: Data from bots and all players (for server operators) can be synchronized.
carpet.rule.syncPlayer.extra.3: OPS_AND_SELF: Operators can sync anyone; regular players can sync bots and themselves.
carpet.rule.syncPlayer.extra.4: EVERYONE: Data of all players is available for synchronization.
carpet.rule.deathskull.desc: Spawns a player skull at the death location that retains items and 50% of experience.
carpet.rule.avoidAnvilTooExpensive.desc: Removes the 'Too Expensive!' limit, allowing anvil operations cost over 40 levels.
carpet.rule.emeraldAttractsVillager.desc: Villagers are attracted to players holding Emeralds or Emerald Blocks (faster with blocks).
carpet.rule.daydream.desc: Allows players to sleep and skip the day during daytime.
carpet.rule.viewPlayerInv.desc: Allows viewing a player's inventory by right-clicking them (or using the /view command).
carpet.rule.viewPlayerInv.extra.1: BOT: Allows viewing the inventory of Carpet bots.
carpet.rule.viewPlayerInv.extra.2: OPS: Permission level 2+ can view any player's inventory.
carpet.rule.viewPlayerInv.extra.3: OPS_AND_SELF: Operators can view anyone; regular players can view bots or themselves.
carpet.rule.viewPlayerInv.extra.4: EVERYONE: Anyone can view any player's inventory.
